import React from 'react'; const UserInfo = ({ boughtCourses }) => { return (

Your Cart

{cart.length > 0 ? ( cart.map((course) => (
{course.title} Course ID: {course.id} {course.cost} Rs
)) ) : (

Your cart is empty

)}

Total: {totalCost} Rs

{showBreakdown && (
e.stopPropagation()}>

Cost Breakdown

Total Cost: {totalCost} Rs

Platform Fee: {platformFee} Rs

GST: {gst} Rs

)}
); }; export default UserInfo;
